meanings.sent1: The unskilled worker struggled to complete the task.
meanings.sent2: The new employee was unskilled in using the software.
meanings.sent3: It was clear the unskilled chef had mistaken salt for sugar in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: Her unskilled attempts at painting resembled a child's finger painting.
meanings.sent5: The unskilled driver caused chaos on the road with their erratic maneuvers.

meanings.definition: Not possessing specialized training or knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The unskilled laborers were hired for basic tasks.
meanings.sent2: She felt unskilled in the field of computer programming.
meanings.sent3: The unskilled detective mistakenly followed the wrong suspect.
meanings.sent4: His unskilled handling of the situation only made matters worse.
meanings.sent5: The unskilled musician struggled to play even the simplest tunes.
